description: These bitwise functions operate on the "two's complement" representation of the integer value of the input arguments and return the result as a corresponding base 10 integer value.
sample:
select INT2AND(1234567,1) from SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
SQL0413N  Overflow occurred during numeric data type conversion.  
SQLSTATE=22003
